entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:02 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 02:08 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow before morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
